result.eng: What are they saying about us?
result.ga: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.orig: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobh
result.html: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaobhWhat are they saying about us?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá siad ag rá inár dtaoḃWhat are they saying about us?

result.html: Cad atá tú ag ráWhat are you saying?
result.ponchtml: Cad atá tú ag ráWhat are you saying?

result.eng: It is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.html: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...
result.ponchtml: Ní gá a rá goIt is not necessary to say that... It goes without saying that...

result.ga: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.orig: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainte
result.html: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do chuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.
result.ponchtml: Tá cuma na fírinne ar do ċuid cainteWhat you're saying seems true.

result.eng: They started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ga: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.orig: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aige
result.html: Thoisigh siad a mhagadh ar Sheimí a rá leis gurb í a bheadh mar mhnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.
result.ponchtml: Ṫoisiġ siad a ṁagaḋ ar Ṡeimí a rá leis gurb í a ḃeaḋ mar ṁnaoi aigeThey started making fun of Jamie, saying she would be his wife one day.

result.ga: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.orig: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caint
result.html: Ach cá bhfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?
result.ponchtml: Aċ cá ḃfuil mé ag caintBut what am I saying?

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.ga: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.orig: Níl gar a bheith ag caint
result.html: Níl gar a bheith ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
result.ponchtml: Níl gar a ḃeiṫ ag caintThere's no point saying anything.
